name: Gandalf G.
review: Unassuming, yet full of surprises. I never leave without a pouch of Longbottom Leaf.

name: Aragorn E.
review: As a ranger, I've tasted many herbs, but nothing quite as regal as the pipe-weed from The Shire; truly fit for a King.
alt-review: I've wandered many lands, but The Shire's pipe-weed is fit for a king. And I would know.

name: Boromir D.
review: One does not simply walk into The Shire without picking up some Halfling leaf.

name: Samwise G.
review: If I know anything, it's gardening. These folks tend their crop the right way.

name: Legolas L.
review: Subtle. Earthy. Notes I haven't encountered in three thousand years. I'm impressed.

name: Gimli G.
review: I never thought I'd praise anything from a Hobbit hole. I've never been happier to be wrong.

name: Faramir D.
review: I was skeptical of Halfling leaf. My father would never approve. But this... this I would defend.
